title: In the form of clay
creator_credit: Gustavsbergs Fabriker, Tor Flyckt, Olle Hallberg and Stig Lasseby
brief_description: The procelain industry of Gustavsberg in Sweden is shown in all its aspects from the processing of the raw clay to the finished product; moulding and forming, the application of color and design by hand and machine followed by the glazing and firing. Features the designs of three of Sweden’s foremost craftsmen.
